item.title: Advent 2019 - Genetic Mutation writeup (First Blood)
item.description: This month, I took a glance at Over The Wire advent CTF with some of my teammates of Securimag. The challenge was asking for at most 4 bytes to patch and I found it sufficient to exploit not the binary itself but rather the exec function. I don't know if that was the intended way, but it was quick enough to pop a shell and get the first blood. Read more at https://xarkes.com/b/advent-2019-Genetic-Mutation-First-Blood.html
item.dc:creator: xarkes

item.title: Hack.lu 2019 - Baby Kernel 2 writeup
item.description: Last october, I participated to Hack.lu Capture The Flag with my team Securimag. I did this writeup as all the ones I've read do not explain how they managed to reliably find the offset of real_cred in the current_task structure. Read more at https://xarkes.com/b/hacklu-2019-babykernel-wu.html
item.dc:creator: xarkes
